author: A_Brickset_user
title: I don't know the word for fietspaden
review:
he means bicycle paths :)

road baseplates are always welcome in my book B)
you can't ever have enough of these and not much can go wrong with some baseplates...
...though a minifig or two would be nice, here I go again!

author: bmwlego
title: Hours of Play
review: I loved LEGO as a kid and the road plates were a major reason for this. These plates were great. I am sorry to see that they have been updated since I was a kid but things change over time. I still have these plates and am so happy that they survived my mom's purging of my childhood LEGO!
